name: supa
description: Root package for Supa monorepo - coordinates development workflow across client, core, and server packages

scripts.preinstall: cd packages/client && npm install && cd ../core && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd packages/client && npm run dev" "cd packages/server && npm run dev" --names "client,server" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta"
